38504.summary: Some customers in the Confederation Park area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
38504.title: June 14 – Saskatoon (Confederation Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
